metadata.name: Winning Buddha
metadata.description:
"The heaven and the hell are reversed, which scares both the immortal and the devil".  

Sun Wukong, known as Monkey King with a suit of Asian style armor.
The body and skin texture of Sun was mixed with the background, the broken worlds.

Mixed-style of CN & JP.
————————————————
"天地变色，神仙与魔物无不为之颤抖”。

孙悟空，人称"美猴王"。
他身披战甲，身体与破碎山河融为一体。

中日混合风格。
